alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:44AM EST until February 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, sleet accumulations of up to one half of an inch and ice accumulations of up to around one tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, North Woods and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
